#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
#include<list>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
vector <string> v;
int cmp(int,int);
int main()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		getchar();
		char s[150];
		scanf("%s",&s);
		v.push_back(s);
	}
	sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	int len=0;
//	printf("%d ",v[0].size());
	for (int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
	len=max(len,cmp(i,i+1));
	printf("%d",len);
	//getchar();
	//getchar();
	//printf("%s\n",v[i]);
	return 0;
}

int cmp(int i,int j)
{	
	int k;
	int n=min(v[i].size(),v[j].size());
	for ( k=0;k<n;k++)
	{
		
		if (v[i][k]==v[j][k]) continue; else break;
	}
	return k;
}
